Utterance of Mockery.name: Utterance of Mockery
Utterance of Mockery.flavor: You speak words of Supernal so potent that your enemy loses its sense of identity and mistakenly attacks itself.
Utterance of Mockery.onHit: As a free action, the target makes a basic attack against itself and hits. If the target has multiple basic attacks, you choose which attack it uses.

Sigil of Repulsion.name: Sigil of Repulsion
Sigil of Repulsion.flavor: You utter ancient words of Supernal, conjuring a silvery glyph that repels your foes.
Sigil of Repulsion.effect: You conjure a glowing sigil in an unoccupied square within range. Any enemy within 5 squares of the sigil must spend 2 extra squares of movement for each space it moves closer to the sigil.

Utterance of Domination.name: Utterance of Domination
Utterance of Domination.flavor: You speak the true name of your enemy, giving you temporary dominion over it.
Utterance of Domination.aftereffect: The target takes 4d10 + Intelligence or Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Utterance of Domination.onMiss: The target takes 2d10 + Intelligence or Charisma modifier psychic damage and is dazed until the end of your next turn.
